title: How to make my friend feel special - Quora

response.answer_text: To make your friend feel special I would suggest you to give the most precious gift in the world “time”.And of course contributing your time for his/her well being is more important which should come naturally from your heart.Support them through thick and thin. Help to Build his/her self confidence .Appreciate every little good work your friend do.Care for him/her because when a person get to know that there is a soul who care for us ,happy to see our success,get broken with our failure then this word would definitely pop up in his/her mind “we are special”.Make your friend a priority in all possible ways :-)

You need not do anything to make your friend feel special. If he loves your company he'll automatically feel special and if you want to make him feel very very special then you should gift something to him which will remind of you. Try not to gift much expensive gifts tey to give precious and valuable and important gift.
